resources.string: আমরা এখন ব্যাংক পেমেন্টও সাপোর্ট করছি। কোনো প্রকার চার্জ ছাড়াই দ্রুত এবং নিরাপদে পেমেন্ট পেতে Settings ক্লিক করে আপনার ব্যাংক অ্যাকাউন্টের প্রয়োজনীয় তথ্য হালনাগাদ করুন, ধন্যবাদ।

Here is a quick review of our core delivery policies. All policies are in our User Manual.

MAXIMUM SIZE AND WEIGHT:
13 inches x 8 inches x 4 inches
Upto 3Kg per parcel. Additional weight is counted as additional deliveries.

WE DO NOT DELIVER:

FRAGILE ITEMS: We ask that you pack your fragile items carefully for pickup and mark it as fragile. We do not assume responsibility for damages.

DAMAGED PARCELS: Our couriers are well trained to carry your parcels with care. We do not assume automatic responsibility for damages. However we will investigate the issue and offer damage compensation on a case-by-case basis.

INSIDE DHAKA DELIVERY: We deliver to all metro areas in Dhaka. To know more about our delivery zones check out our Delivery Zones.

OUTSIDE DHAKA DELIVERY: We deliver outside Dhaka through Sundarban National Courier, however, cash on delivery (COD) is NOT available for outside Dhaka deliveries.
"N.B: Don't forget to book a pickup on your pickup entry date and write the Product ID on your product label."
